name: Cherry Bomb
description:
The Cherry Bomb is another Chick Sticks Version of a Retro Shape Planing Hull design. 
Very Short, Fat and Wide and Super Easy for Girls to handle. This board is one of the easiest to paddle in the Chick Sticks line up and excels in mushy and small surf.
Its a Small Wave Magic Board. Shorter and Wider than the Lolita Loca shape. Comes as a Quad Fin set up and is remarkably fast, smooth and user friendly for all surf abilities from Beginner to Advanced Surfers. 

Std Size 5.4 x 20.5 x 2.625.

(additional shipping charge for orders to Hawaii)

name: Lolita Loca
description:
Lolita Loca is a Chick Sticks Version of a Retro Shape Planing Hull design. Very Short, Fat and Wide and Super Easy for Girls to handle. This board is the easiest to paddle in the Chick Sticks line up and excels in mushy and small surf.     Its a Small Wave Magic Board. 
Comes as a Twinzer set up and is remarkably fast, smooth and user friendly for all surf abilities from Beginner to Advanced Surfers. 

Std Size 5.6 x 20 x 2.625.

(additional shipping charge for orders to Hawaii)

name: Shred Betty Grom 5.2
description:
Chick Sticks Shred Betty is the Perfect First Board for the Micro grom and grom who want to learn in the whitewash, progress to open face waves and even compete all on the same board. A wider deck and soft squash tail offer stability.

Std Size 5.2 x 18.50 x 2.00.

(additional shipping charge for orders to Hawaii)

name: Little Screamer 5.9
description:
Little Screamer is a performance thruster geared toward the Girl who wants to compete or has graduated to the smallest and most aggressive board in the Chick Sticks line up. A softer nose, wider tail and a little more foam make this a very forgiving Girl Friendly board. It just got easier to step up your surfing. Super Fast, Super Performance for the Advanced Surfer. 

Std Size 5.9 x 18.58 x 2.38.

(additional shipping fees for Hawaii)

name: Little Screamer Pro Series XTR
description:
Chick Sticks Pro Series XTR’s are top of the line Performance and Technology featuring patented stringerless waterproof blanks and XTR Epoxy Pro's proprietary Epoxy that never yellows. The board models offered in the Chick Sticks Pro Series have been totally tweaked for Ultimate Performance. The perfect combination of Nose and Tail Rocker, Contour, Concave and Parabolic Channels in the deck offer High Performing, Responsive board with more Flex. Only the top Brands get the XTR experience and you can own the Highest Quality girls brand with the most aggressive technology in the industry. Chick Sticks Pro Series XTR's will take your Surfing to the next level!! Shaped to your Custom Dimensions or Standard Size as offered. Chick Sticks currently offers top top performing Little Screamer, Hoochie Mod and Vixen XTR Style. 

Std Size 5.9 x 18.58 x 2.38.

(additional shipping fees for Hawaii)

name: Vixen 5 Fin Option Fish
description:
Chick Sticks Vixen is a progressive 5-fin option Fish that’s fun and super easy to ride. 
Works well in white wash while you learn and 
shines in open face waves when you’re ready.
A slimmed down tail makes it easier for a girl to duck dive. 
This well thought out shape works awesome for Beginner to advanced Surfers.

Std Size 5.10 x 20 x 2.50.

(additional shipping charge for orders to Hawaii)

(boards shipped to Hawaii will have an additional shipping fee)

name: Hoochie Mod 5.10
description:
5 Fin Option Egg
Chick Sticks Hoochie Mod is a versatile 5 fin option egg shape that shreds as well in 2 foot junk as it does in 8 foot bombs. 
This board is super easy to paddle and duck dive and sticks to the shoulder like super glue for flawless drops ins.
 With a little extra volume and girl Friendly shape this board is perfect for the Intermediate girl who wants to take her Surfing to the next level.

Std Size 5.10 x 19.50 x 2.75.

(boards shipped to Hawaii will have an additional shipping fee)

name: Hoochie Mama 6.6
description:
Chick Sticks Hoochie Mama a Poly Fun Board not Foam. 
Learn in style on a board that’s so forgiving you can ride this in white wash and then open face as you progress. This is a performance board with a lot of R&D put in to it. 
The pulled in nose and slightly narrower tail allow you to turn and progress on a fun board shape.

Std Size 6.6 x 21.75 x 2.75.

(additional shipping charge for orders to Hawaii)

name: Bad Betty 7.0
description:
5 Fin option
7.0 Mini longboard5 Fin option &
8.0 longboard
Chick Sticks Bad Betty is another Chick Sticks original.
It’s a 5 fin option that’s offered in 7.0 and 8.0 lengths 
that’s Fun and Easy to Ride. 
Ride this unique board as a Quad, tri or twin Fin.
Designed for the Surfer girl who’s just starting out that
doesn’t want too much board to handle and the extra rocker in the nose helps prevent pearling. 
Performs beautifully for Beginner to advanced Surfers.

Std Size 7.0 x 21.75 x 2.88. Std Size 8.0 x 22 1/4 x 3.

(additional shipping charge for orders to Hawaii)

name: Bad Betty 8.0
description:
Bad Betty is another Chick Sticks Original. It’s a 5 fin option 8.0 that’s Fun and Easy to Ride. 
Ride this unique board as a Quad, Tri or Twin Fin. 
Designed for the Surfer Girl who’s just starting out that doesn’t want too much board to handle and the extra rocker in the nose helps prevent pearling. 
Performs beautifully for Beginner to Advanced Surfers.

Std Size 8.0 X 22.125 X 3

(additional shipping charge for Hawaii)
